Class Window

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Window(int width, int height, boolean fullscreen)
      Instantiates the window with a width, height, and if it will be fullscreen.

        public void setDisplayMode(int width,
                           int height,
                           boolean fullscreen)
                    throws DisplayException
        Changes the width,height, and fullscreen status of the game window.
        Parameters:
        width - The new width
        height - The new height
        fullscreen - The new fullscreen status
        Throws:
        DisplayException - Thrown if the display mode could not be retrieved
